subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Diego Maradona and his 1986 World Cup-winning Argentina teammates have agreed to an unofficial rematch with their England counterparts. The teams will meet in Birmingham on Oct. 14 more than 21 years after Maradona struck two of soccer’s most talked-about goals for Argentina to win a quarterfinal, 2-1.
